title: No reason to stay
creator_credit: Mort Ransen, John Kemeny and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A look at the school drop-out and what they drop out from. A deliberately biased look at today’s educational system and how it fails, if it does, to give young people the preparation they need for adult life when school doors close behind them. A provocative film for all concerned with the course of education.
